emails.subject: Laptop won't turn on
emails.body: Hi, I bought the UltraBook Pro 15 last week and now it won't power on at all. I've tried holding the power button but nothing happens. Order #ORD-1001. Please help!

emails.subject: Question about wireless mouse battery
emails.body: How long should the battery last on the ErgoMouse Wireless? Mine seems to drain very quickly (less than a week). Is this normal?

emails.subject: Shipping delay on my order
emails.body: I ordered a monitor (ORD-1003) 10 days ago and it still hasn't shipped. The website said 3-5 day delivery. What's going on?

emails.subject: Re: Laptop won't turn on
emails.body: I tried the hard reset you suggested but it still doesn't work. The charging light doesn't even come on when I plug it in.
